price: We have not taught him poetry, nor is it fitting for him. This is only a Reminder and a clear Qur’an
arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمۡنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعۡرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لَهُۥٓۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ وَقُرۡءَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
